thread.title: 100 Best Hip-Hop Albums of All Time
thread.title_full: 100 Best Hip-Hop Albums of All Time

title: 100 Best Hip-Hop Albums of All Time
text:
Fame proved elusive for the Brooklyn MC, but Jeru's edutainment and Premier's mind-blowing compositions made his debut one of the quintessential 90s hip-hop albums. Check Amazon rating » © Top Dawg/Aftermath Buy from Amazon 
There's a lot to love about Kendrick Lamar's good kid, m.A.A.d cit y. For starters, it's a remarkable rap album in every sense rap can be remarkable in this age. It's a portrait of the jungle through the eyes of a prey. And despite a Grammy snub, it was well received by fans, critics and peers. Check Amazon rating » (Photo © Jemal Countess/Getty)
